Title: Enacts provisions for the protection of the health, safety and employment rights of persons suffering employment loss from the closure of nuclear electric plants
Summary: Enacts provisions for the protection of the health, safety and employment rights of persons suffering employment loss from the closure of nuclear electric plants.
LawCode: Add §28, Pub Serv L; amd §§860-a, 860-b, 860-g & 860-h, add §860-j, Lab L; amd §206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, the labor law and the public health law, in relation to the protection of the health, safety and employment rights of employees suffering employment loss as the result of the sale or closure of a nuclear electric generation facility
